sourcesContent:
export default {

        {
            id: "iggy",
            email: "iggy@bc.edu",
            photo: "/assets/user2.png",
            name: "St. Iggy",
            bio: "Trying my best to be a role model person for and with othersüôèüèº"

            tags: ["Boxes", "Lower"],
            datetime: "2020-02-06T22:45:28Z"
        },
        {

        {

            type: "offer",
            title: "Meal Swipes at Lower",
            desc: "My meal plan still have $500 left on, and I'd hate for it to go to waste! Willing to swipe for anyone's dinner from Tuesday to Thursday if you give me a heads up as a response to this post! Don't be shy!",
            tags: ["Food", "Lower"],
            datetime: "2020-02-06T22:45:28Z"
        },
        {
            id: "post-6",
            userId: "esther",
            userPhoto: "/assets/user5.png",
            type: "need",
            title: "Moving Help",
            desc: "I am moving into a new apartment near campus and I would love any extra hands. I have 6 boxes and it is hard to move on my own.",
            tags: ["Moving", "Off-Campus"],
            datetime: "2020-02-06T22:45:28Z"
        },
        {
            id: "post-7",
            userId: "tommy",
            userPhoto: "/assets/user4.png",
            type: "offer",
            title: "Ride to Costco",
            desc: "I have a van on-campus that can fit 7 other people for anyone that wants to visit Costco with me this weekend!",
            tags: ["Transportation", "Off-Campus"],

        },
        {
            id: "post-8",
            userId: "adam",
            userPhoto: "/assets/user3.png",
            type: "need",
            title: "Laptop Charger",
            desc: "My laptop charger just broke and the library ran out of chargers too. Does anyone have a spare USB-C cable they can lend me for a few days while I order a new one?",
            tags: ["Electronics", "Computer"],

        {
